entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 01:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
